name: My Beloved Snowboarder
description:
My Beloved Snowboarder is a game about dealing with loss. It is a weird combination of a story driven and a runner game in 2d space.

CONTROLS

Press A-D or Left-Right Arrow Keys for Movement

Use Left Mouse Click for Menu Interactions and to Skip Dialogues

Press Space to Pause Game

WARNING: This video game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.
